title: President Trump criticizes women’s marches, boasts TV ratings on Twitter
title_page: President Trump criticizes women’s marches, boasts TV ratings on Twitter
maintext:
By Staff
Since officially assuming office Friday afternoon and taking over the @POTUS account, President Trump has been uncharacteristically quiet on Twitter.
That ended Sunday morning, as Trump took to his personal Twitter account Sunday morning to criticize Saturday’s women’s marches and boast about the television ratings of his inauguration.
Continue reading on Philly.com
http://www.philly.com/philly/blogs/real-time/President-Trump-criticizes-womens-marches-boasts-TV-ratings-in-Sunday-tweets.html
